name: Breakout (itch) (Dkfreeze)
description:
A short game of Breakout with only three levels. Controls can be accessed through the title screen.

BGM: "Title Screen," "Choose a File," "Pokey," "Battle Against a Weak Opponent," "Sanctuary Guardian," "A Bad Dream," "Boy Meets Girl," "Pokey Means Business!," "Good Friends, Bad Friends" All from the Earthbound/Mother 2 OST

All SFX are made by me
